title: Calories in Small Wendy's Fry
meta_description: Discover calories in small Wendy's fry, including full nutrition breakdown like carbs, fat, protein, sodium, and quick tweaks for variations.
assumptions: Wendy's small natural-cut fries, fried, standard preparation with salt; based on official nutrition data (approx. 113g serving).
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by location, preparation, and portion size. Check Wendy's app or menu for latest values.

quick_answer.text: A small Wendy's fry serving contains 230 calories and 3g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.
